summary: In 1930s, Wu Qionghua was a housemaid of Nan-ba-tian, a cruel warlord of a village in Hainan Island, China. Often abused by her master, Qionghua was finally rescued by Hong Changqing, ... See full summary »
cast: Qiang Chen|Niu Tie|Xin-Gang Wang|Mei Xiang|Jinghua Xue|Xijuan Zhu
title: Hong se niang zi jun
